properties.description: Load Data From Blob To Synapse SQL Pool

source:
%%pyspark
# Imporing the libraries
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit,col,sum,mean,regexp_replace,to_date,count,row_number
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window

# Creating a spark session and connection to blob storage account
blob_account_name = "rawdevstorage"
blob_container_name = "output"
sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("cmdevsynapse-WorkspaceDefaultStorage")
spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)

# Define the path to the Delta table
delta_table_path = 'abfss://output@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Electricity_Measurement_pyspark_join'

# Read Delta table into a DataFrame
reference_table = spark.read.format("delta").load(delta_table_path)
# Show the contents of the DataFrame

# Creating a group by for Markt dimension
grouped_reference_table_markt_dimension = reference_table.groupBy("DM_Markt")
markt_dimension = grouped_reference_table_markt_dimension.agg(count("DM_Trekkingsdatum"))

grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_1 = reference_table.groupBy("DM_Trekkingsdatum")
date_dimension_1 = grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_1.agg(count("DM_Trekkingsdatum"))

grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_2 = reference_table.groupBy("DM_Peildatum")
date_dimension_2 = grouped_reference_table_date_dimension_2.agg(count("DM_Trekkingsdatum"))

# Exclude the undefined/null value
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.filter(col("DM_Markt").isNotNull())
date_dimension_1 = date_dimension_1.filter(col("DM_Trekkingsdatum").isNotNull())
date_dimension_2 = date_dimension_2.filter(col("DM_Peildatum").isNotNull())

# Rename columns
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.withColumnRenamed("DM_Markt", "Markt_Name") \
.withColumnRenamed("count(DM_Trekkingsdatum)", "count")

date_dimension_1 = date_dimension_1.withColumnRenamed("DM_Trekkingsdatum", "Date") \
.withColumnRenamed("count(DM_Trekkingsdatum)", "count")

date_dimension_2 = date_dimension_2.withColumnRenamed("DM_Peildatum", "Date") \
.withColumnRenamed("count(DM_Trekkingsdatum)", "count")

# Selecting specific columns
date_dimension_1 =date_dimension_1.select("Date")
date_dimension_2 =date_dimension_2.select("Date")


# Unioning the date dimension and removing the duplicates
date_dimension = date_dimension_1.union(date_dimension_2).distinct()

# Define the window specification for the grouping
markt_dimension_window_spec = Window.orderBy(markt_dimension["Markt_Name"].desc()) #Window.partitionBy("DM_Markt").orderBy("DM_Markt")
date_dimension_window_spec = Window.orderBy(date_dimension["Date"].desc())

# Add an auto-incrementing column to the DataFrame within the group
markt_dimension = markt_dimension.withColumn("Markt_ID", row_number().over(markt_dimension_window_spec))
date_dimension = date_dimension.withColumn("Date_ID", row_number().over(date_dimension_window_spec))

# Selecting specific columns and Rearranging the columns
markt_dimension =markt_dimension.select("Markt_ID", "Markt_Name")

# Displaying the Markt markt_dimension
display(markt_dimension)

# Writing the markt dimension to delta file
file_path = 'abfss://goldlayer@rawdevstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/PySparkDimensions/Markt_Dimension'
write_format="delta"
#partition_by=["DM_Peildatum"]
mode_ = "overwrite" #append

markt_dimension\
.write\
.option("header", "true")\
.option("overwriteSchema", "true")\
.format(write_format)\
.mode(mode_)\
.save(file_path)

#.partitionBy(partition_by)\
